Package de.intarsys.pdf.app.appearance

The "framework" for dealing with appearances.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
IAppearanceCreator A strategy for creating the appearances (PDForm objects) for an annotation.
IAppearanceCreatorRegistry A registry for IAppearanceCreator instances.
 

Class Summary
AppearanceCreatorRegistry A VM singleton for the IAppearanceCreatorRegistry.
AppearanceCreatorTools Tool class for tasks related to appearance creation.
NullAppearanceCreator Create an empty annotation appearance.
StandardAppearanceCreatorRegistry A registry for the available IAppearanceCreator strategies.
 

Package de.intarsys.pdf.app.appearance Description

The "framework" for dealing with appearances. This is really needed when later on an interactive/viewer application needs to create appearances. It is here already to satisfy the dependencies from the IFormHandler frameworks.
